TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListBox extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class ListBox Inherits ListControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler
type ListBox = class inherit ListControl interface IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 表示允許單一或多重項目選取的清單方塊控制項。

span.span: Represents a list box control that allows single or multiple item selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用控制項來建立清單控制項，可讓單一或多個項目選取項目。Use the control to create a list control that allows single or multiple item selection. 使用屬性來指定控制項的高度。Use the property to specify the height of the control. 若要啟用多個項目選取項目，設定屬性設`ListSelectionMode.Multiple`。To enable multiple item selection, set the property to `ListSelectionMode.Multiple`. 若要指定您想要在顯示的項目控制項，放置`ListItem`每個項目的開頭和結尾標記之間的項目控制項。To specify the items that you want to appear in the control, place a `ListItem` element for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the control. 使用集合，以檢查中所包含的物件控制項。Use the collection to examine the objects contained in the control. 比方說，您可以判斷在選取的項目列舉的控制項集合和測試每個值項目。For example, you can determine the selected item(s) in the control by enumerating the collection and testing the value for each element. 控制項也支援資料繫結。The control also supports data binding. 若要將控制項繫結至資料來源，先建立資料來源，例如其中一種物件，包含要在控制項中顯示的項目。To bind the control to a data source, first create a data source, such as one of the objects, that contains the items to display in the control. 接下來，使用方法來繫結至資料來源控制項。Next, use the method to bind the data source to the control. 使用並屬性，以指定的繫結至資料來源中欄位`Text`和`Value`屬性，分別，每個清單項目在控制項中。Use the and properties to specify which field in the data source to bind to the `Text` and `Value` properties, respectively, of each list item in the control. 控制項現在會顯示來自資料來源的資訊。The control will now display the information from the data source. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入再顯示在控制項中的輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to:防止 Web 應用程式中的指令碼攻擊，藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，並[ASP.NET Web Pages 中驗證使用者輸入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合協助工具標準的標記資訊，請參閱[協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ```              ``` ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立控制項。The following example demonstrates how to create a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ListBox Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ListBox Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何建立支援多重選取的控制項。The following example shows how to create a control that supports multiple selections. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ListBox Example 2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/CS/source3cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ListBox Example 2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/VB/source3vb.aspx#3)] 下列範例示範如何建立透過資料繫結的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to create a control through data binding. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ListBox Example 2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/CS/source2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ListBox Example 2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/VB/source2vb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 取得 控制項中目前已選取項目之索引值的陣列。

span.span: Gets the array of index values for currently selected items in the control.

returns.span: 整數陣列，每個整數都表示清單方塊中已選取項目的索引。

span.span: An array of integers, each representing the index of a selected item in the list box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來識別或存取在選取的項目控制項。Use the method to identify or access the selected items in the control. 傳回陣列中的每個項目代表選取的清單項目的索引。Each element in the returned array represents the index for a selected list item. 您可以使用索引值，來存取中的項目集合。You can use the index values to access the items in the collection.

summary.span: 載入清單控制項的張貼內容 (如果與最後張貼的內容不同的話)。

span.span: Loads the posted content of the list control, if it is different from the last posting.

returns.span: 如果張貼的內容與最後張貼不同，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the posted content is different from the last posting; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的自訂控制項時，方法主要由控制項開發人員，用類別。The method is used primarily by control developers, when deriving a custom control from the class. 方法會指示如果狀態控制項已變更。The method indicates if the state of the control has changed. 換句話說，它會決定在控制項中的每個清單項目具有相同與最後張貼的值的值。In other words, it determines if each list item in the control has the same value as the last posted value. 使用者控制項變更選取項目值相對應物件中的集合控制項。A user selecting an item in the control changes the value for the corresponding object in the collection of the control. 如果在控制項中，選取一些清單項目，或如果停用，則傳回`false`。If some list items are selected in the control, or if the is disabled, returns `false`. 當方法會傳回`true`控制項，ASP.NET 網頁架構會叫用控制項的方法。When the method returns `true` for a control, the ASP.NET page framework invokes the method for the control.

related.span: ListBox Web 伺服器控制項概觀

summary.span: 在用戶端上呈現以前，先設定 控制項。

span.span: Configures the control prior to rendering on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的自訂控制項時，方法主要由控制項開發人員，用類別。The method is used primarily by control developers, when deriving a custom control from the class. 方法可讓衍生的類別，來處理事件，而沒有附加委派。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 方法會執行任何預先呈現的必要步驟，再儲存檢視狀態和轉譯內容。The method performs any necessary prerendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content for the .

para.span: 當覆寫方法在衍生類別中，務必呼叫方法的基底類別，好讓註冊的委派可接收事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

related.span: ListBox Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

summary.span: 只要 控制項的張貼資料已變更，便叫用 方法。

span.span: Invokes the method whenever posted data for the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的自訂控制項時，方法主要由控制項開發人員，用控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers, when deriving a custom control from the control. ASP.NET 網頁架構會呼叫方法控制何時方法可讓您指出已變更清單項目的狀態中控制項。The ASP.NET page framework calls the method on a control when the method indicates that the state of the list items have changed in the control. 方法呼叫方法以引發事件。The method calls the method to raise the event. 控制項開發人員可以覆寫方法來執行自訂處理，當使用者在控制項中選取清單項目。Control developers can override the method to perform custom processing when the user selects list items in the control. 方法可以選擇性地執行驗證，再引發控制項事件。The method can optionally perform validation before raising the event for the control. 若要驗證一組內的清單項目時的頁面上的控制項選取時，設定並屬性，以`true`，然後指定要在驗證控制項群組屬性。To validate a group of controls on the page when a list item within the is selected, set the and properties to `true`, and then specify the group of controls to validate in the property.

related.span: ListBox Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中顯示的列數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows displayed in the control.

value.span: 顯示於 控制項中的列數。

span.span: The number of rows displayed in the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要顯示在資料列數目控制項。Use the property to specify the number of rows to display in the control. > [!CAUTION] > 資料列數目必須介於 1 到 2000年。The number of rows must be between one and 2000. 此範圍以外的值將會引發例外狀況。Values outside of this range will raise an exception. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以顯示六個資料列控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display six rows in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ListBox.Rows Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox.Rows Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ListBox.Rows Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox.Rows Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的列數小於一或大於 2000。

span.span: The specified number of rows is less than one or greater than 2000.

related.span: ListBox Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListSelectionMode SelectionMode { get; set; }

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的選取模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the selection mode of the control.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的模式行為控制項。Use the property to specify the mode behavior of the control. 將此屬性設定為`ListSelectionMode.Single`表示可以選取單一項目，從控制項，而`ListSelectionMode.Multiple`指定可以選取多個項目。Setting this property to `ListSelectionMode.Single` indicates only a single item can be selected from the control, while `ListSelectionMode.Multiple` specifies multiple items can be selected. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用屬性，以允許使用者選取多個選取項目控制項。The following example illustrates how to use the property to allow the user to select multiple selections from the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListBoxSelectionMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxSelectionMode/CS/listboxselectionmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListBoxSelectionMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxSelectionMode/VB/listboxselectionmodevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的選取模式不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The specified selection mode is not one of the values.

related.span: ListBox Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您應該使用方法來處理張貼的資料變更物件。Typically, you should use the method to process posted data for changes to a object. 方法是明確的介面成員實作。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定義處理張貼的資料的自訂實作物件，覆寫成員。

span.span: To define a custom implementation for processing posted data for a object, override the member.

para.span: 明確介面實作會呼叫方法來處理控制項的張貼的資料。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the method to process the posted data for the control.

related.span: ListBox Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

virtual void System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent() = System::Web::UI::IPostBackDataHandler::RaisePostDataChangedEvent;

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 只要 控制項的張貼資料已變更，便叫用 方法。

span.span: Invokes the method whenever posted data for the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您應該使用方法以引發事件時的張貼的資料物件變更。Typically, you should use the method to raise an event when the posted data for a object changes. 方法是明確的介面成員實作。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定義的自訂實作，以引發的事件物件，覆寫成員。

span.span: To define a custom implementation for raising the event for a object, override the member.

para.span: 明確介面實作會呼叫方法以引發事件時張貼的資料已變更的控制項。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the method to raise the event when posted data has changed for the control.

related.span: ListBox Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview
